sentences.en: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.cn: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.en: There are only three flights a day to Logan Airport from Heathrow.
sentences.cn: 希思罗机场每天只有三趟飞往洛根机场的航班。

phrases.cn: n. 飞行控制；飞行指挥

sentences.en: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.
sentences.cn: 由于大公司的竞争，他的生意陷入了困境。

sentences.en: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.
sentences.cn: 由于报酬低，该城市雇用得到的临时工程师就更少了。

sentences.en: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.cn: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境， 现在正面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.en: You can fly direct from Seattle to Europe.
sentences.cn: 你可以从西雅图直飞欧洲。

phrases.cn: n. 外国直接投资，对外直接投资

sentences.en: an airline pilot
sentences.cn: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.en: a fighter pilot
sentences.cn: 战斗机驾驶员

sentences.en: The official report into the accident says that it was caused by pilot error (= a mistake by the pilot ) .
sentences.cn: 那宗事故的官方报告称事故是由飞行员失误造成的。

phrases.cn: 试点项目，试点工程；样板工程，样板设计
n. 初步研究；预备试验；飞行员研究

sentences.en: She wanted to be the first woman to climb Mount Qomolangma, and she almost succeeded.
sentences.cn: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

phrases.cn: 成功；在…方面成功；顺利完成

sentences.en: They can be applied in any context, as long as you understand how to apply them, of course.
sentences.cn: 他们可以在任何一种背景下应用，当然，只要你懂得如何去应用他们。

sentences.en: Why, in its presence, should I deny the joy of living, as long as I know everything is not included in this joy?
sentences.cn: 为什么在生活的快乐明明存在时，只要我知道一切都不存在于这种快乐中，我就会否认这种快乐？

sentences.en: But he said as long as we remained the only intelligent life in our galaxy and avoided destroying ourselves we should be safe.
sentences.cn: 但是他说只要我们保持在我们的星系中是唯一有智力的生命并且避免破坏我们自己，我们就会安全。

sentences.en: a shortage of jobs for school-leavers
sentences.cn: 中学毕业生就业岗位的短缺

trans.tranCn: 确切地；完全；[口]（表示赞同）确实如此

sentences.en: It’s exactly half past five.
sentences.cn: 一分不差，正好5点半。

sentences.en: The figures may not be exactly right, but they’re close enough.
sentences.cn: 那些数字可能不是非常精确，但也相当接近。

sentences.en: ‘Report back to me in an hour, sergeant.’ ‘Yes, sir.’
sentences.cn: “一小时后向我报告，中士。”“是，长官。”

sentences.en: Can I help you, sir?
sentences.cn: 我能为您效劳吗，先生？

sentences.en: Sir! You dropped your wallet.
sentences.cn: 先生！ 您的钱包掉了。

phrases.cn: 尊敬的先生或女士（信笺的开头语）

sentences.en: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.cn: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

sentences.en: He understands – he’s not stupid.
sentences.cn: 他明白——他又不笨。

sentences.en: I couldn’t do it, and it made me feel stupid.
sentences.cn: 这件事我做不来，这让我感到自己很愚蠢。

sentences.en: He wouldn't take his hat off.
sentences.cn: 他不愿脱下他的帽子。

sentences.en: Gene has to wear a jacket and tie to work.
sentences.cn: 吉恩上班得穿西装打领带。

phrases.cn: 羽绒服；鸭绒衣；羽绒夹克

sentences.en: I’ll show you to your room. Ours is next door.
sentences.cn: 我带你去你的房间，我们的房间在你的隔壁。

sentences.en: The main difference between our brains and those of monkeys is that ours are bigger.
sentences.cn: 我们的大脑和猴子的大脑之间的主要差别在于我们的要大些。

sentences.en: No, that’s not ours.
sentences.cn: 不，那不是我们的。

sentences.en: I wear a shirt and tie at work.
sentences.cn: 我上班穿衬衫打领带。

phrases.cn: 占用；包扎；绑好；缚牢；阻碍；密切联系；合伙；停泊

sentences.en: (= many rows ) of shelves stacked with books
sentences.cn: 一排又一排堆满书的架子

sentences.en: They have a nice pool in their backyard.
sentences.cn: 他们后院有个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.en: a shallow pool suitable for children
sentences.cn: 适合儿童的浅水池

sentences.en: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.cn: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.en: The main railway line passes just north of Manchester.
sentences.cn: 那条铁路干线正好经过曼彻斯特北面。

sentences.en: the novel’s secondary characters
sentences.cn: 这本小说中的次要人物

sentences.en: The formal education sector comprises primary and secondary school institutions.
sentences.cn: 正式教育机构包括初级和中等教育机构。

sentences.en: He is trying to set up a new secondary school in Acton because he is not satisfied with the choice facing his four children under six.
sentences.cn: 他也正努力在阿克顿建立一所新的中等学校。 他对他那四个不到六岁的孩子将要面临的选择而不满。

sentences.en: The government provides free education at both primary and secondary school levels and provides some financial assistance for private schools.
sentences.cn: 政府对初级和中级学校都提供免费教育，并对私立学校给予一定的经济支持。

sentences.en: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.cn: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

sentences.en: church bells
sentences.cn: 教堂的钟

phrases.cn: 为大家的利益承担危险

sentences.en: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.cn: 世界上的富国

sentences.en: I was sitting on the floor shivering with fear because a bullet had been fired through a window.
sentences.cn: 我坐在地板上吓得浑身发抖，因为有一颗子弹射穿窗户打了进来。

trans.tranCn: （用于表示过去真实或经常性的行为，特别强调现在不那样了）过去

sentences.en: He used to go to our school.
sentences.cn: 他曾在我们学校就读。

sentences.en: We’re eating out more often than we used to.
sentences.cn: 我们现在出去吃饭的次数比以前多了。

sentences.en: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.cn: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.en: the distribution of wealth
sentences.cn: 财富的分配

sentences.en: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.cn: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

sentences.en: The church has doubled its membership in the last five years.
sentences.cn: 这座教堂的会众在过去的五年里增加了一倍。

sentences.en: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.cn: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

phrases.cn:
极难得,简直不,几乎不：

He seldom or never drinks.
他简直可以说滴酒不沾。

sentences.en: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.cn: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.en: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.cn: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.en: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.cn: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.en: In her spare time she read books on cooking.
sentences.cn: 她在业余时间读些烹饪方面的书。

sentences.en: Uncle Herbert never argued, never spoke up for himself.
sentences.cn: 赫伯特叔叔从不争论，从不为自己辩护。

sentences.en: communication between deaf and hearing people
sentences.cn: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.en: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.cn: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.en: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.cn: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

phrases.cn: 充耳不闻；不加理睬；不愿听

sentences.en: a tiny community in the Midwest
sentences.cn: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.en: The earrings were tiny.
sentences.cn: 耳环很小。

sentences.en: a tiny little baby
sentences.cn: 丁点大的婴儿

sentences.en: an electric blanket
sentences.cn: 电热毯

sentences.en: We waited for the lights to change.
sentences.cn: 我们等着红绿灯转换。

sentences.en: Eventually the lights turned green.
sentences.cn: 绿灯终于亮了。

sentences.en: The driver had failed to stop at a red light.
sentences.cn: 红灯亮时司机没有把车停下。

sentences.en: The candle flickered in the wind.
sentences.cn: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.en: The wind flared the candle.
sentences.cn: 风吹得烛光闪动。

sentences.en: The candle flickered and then went out.
sentences.cn: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.en: That postman is in charge of this route.
sentences.cn: 那个邮递员负责这条投递线路。

sentences.en: Curtis Matthews, a retired postman from North Carolina, was running the bar as a favour to his brother, who had left Louisiana after the attempt on his life the year before.
sentences.cn: 柯蒂斯·马修斯是一名来自南卡罗来纳的邮递员。 在因约翰·马修斯生命受到威胁而离开路易斯安那州以后，他就帮哥哥经营着酒店。

sentences.en: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.cn: 我冷得发抖。

sentences.en: Don’t go out in the cold without your coat!
sentences.cn: 外面很冷，穿上外套再出去！

phrases.cn: 被忽视，被冷落， 孤零零地未介入

sentences.en: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.en: Angela liked to rest during the heat of the day (= the hottest part of the day ).
sentences.cn: 安杰拉喜欢在一天中最热的时段休息一下。

sentences.en: Firefighters were beaten back by the intense heat.
sentences.cn: 消防队员被高温迫得后退。

sentences.en: ...a full-time job.
sentences.cn: …一份全职工作。

phrases.cn: 全日制学生；全职学生，脱产学生

sentences.en: Until now scientists had very little clear evidence about the drug's role in preventing more serious effects of infection.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，科学家们几乎没有该药物在防止更严重的感染后果的功能的明确证据。

sentences.en: She also hopes her children will get a good education.
sentences.cn: 她也希望她的孩子可以受到良好的教育。

sentences.en: efforts to improve girls’ access to education
sentences.cn: 为增加女孩受教育机会所作的努力

phrases.cn: 高等教育（指含大学以上的教育）

sentences.en: commuters who travel on public transport
sentences.cn: 乘坐公共交通车辆上下班的人

sentences.en: It’s easier to get to the college if you have your own transport (= a car, bicycle etc ) .
sentences.cn: 如果你有自己的交通工具，去学院就会更方便。

sentences.en: Nichols set off for his remote farmhouse in Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 尼科尔斯启程前往他位于康涅狄格州的偏远农舍。

sentences.en: The president's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.cn: 总统特使再次踏上外交之旅。

sentences.en: a pair of socks
sentences.cn: 一双短袜

sentences.en: white ankle socks
sentences.cn: 白色的齐踝短袜

phrases.cn: vt. 阻止…飞行；关闭…不许飞机起落

sentences.en: The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.cn: 每当我写字的时候，右臂上的疖子就使我感到疼痛。

sentences.en: Shops are no longer allowed to push up their prices whenever they want.
sentences.cn: 再不允许商店想什么时候提价就提价了。

sentences.en: Everything was in its proper place (= where it should be ) .
sentences.cn: 每样东西都放在恰当的位置。

sentences.en: the proper way to clean your teeth
sentences.cn: 正确的刷牙方法

sentences.en: The proper name for Matthew’s condition is hyperkinetic syndrome.
sentences.cn: 马修的病的恰当名称是多动症。

phrases.cn: 适当的时候；[物理]原时；本征时间

sentences.en: Put the eggs in the centre of the dish, with the vegetables and herbs around the edge.
sentences.cn: 把鸡蛋放在盘子中间，盘边一圈放些蔬菜和香草。

sentences.en: He stood at the water’s edge staring across the lake.
sentences.cn: 他站在水边，凝视着湖对面。

sentences.en: A leaf was on the ground, curling up at the edges.
sentences.cn: 地上有一片叶子，叶边卷曲着。

sentences.en: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.en: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.cn: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.en: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.cn: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.en: A few minutes later the bomb went off, destroying the vehicle.
sentences.cn: 几分钟后炸弹爆炸了，摧毁了那辆车。

sentences.en: Thousands of people will starve if food doesn’t reach the city.
sentences.cn: 如果食品不能运到那座城市，成千上万的人就要饿死。

sentences.en: pictures of starving children
sentences.cn: 饥饿儿童的照片

sentences.en: They’ll either die from the cold or starve to death (= die from lack of food ) .
sentences.cn: 他们要么会冻死，要么会饿死。

sentences.en: ‘I can’t open this drawer.’ ‘Here, let me have a go .’
sentences.cn: “我打不开这个抽屉。”“来，让我试试看。”

sentences.en: On the tour, everyone can have a go at making a pot.
sentences.cn: 这次去参观，每个人都可以试着做一个陶罐。

sentences.en: I’d thought about it for some time and decided to give it a go (= try to do something ) .
sentences.cn: 这事我考虑了一段时间，决定尝试一下。

sentences.en: If you have emails or memos to write, do them all in one go.
sentences.cn: 如果你有电子邮件或者备忘录可以写写，就一口气全部做了。

sentences.en: The top of the box was sealed with wide brown parcel tape, Jacob managed to get his fingernail under the end and peeled off the tape in one go.
sentences.cn: 箱子的顶端是用褐色的包裹胶带封起来的，雅各布用指甲把胶带的一头抠起来，一下子把胶带整个扯开。

sentences.en: You certainly couldn't eat it all in one go anyway, it wouldn't be a romantic moment.
sentences.cn: 无论如何，你都肯定不可能一口气吃掉这只牡蛎，何况那样做的话，也肯定不那么浪漫。

sentences.en: To build the tunnel, they had to cut through 500 feet of solid rock .
sentences.cn: 为了建这条隧道，他们不得不凿穿500英尺的坚硬岩石。

sentences.en: Most of the country is desert and bare rock .
sentences.cn: 这个国家大部分地区都是沙漠和裸露的岩石。

sentences.en: massive rock formations
sentences.cn: 巨大的岩层

phrases.cn: 岩体；岩块，岩块体；岩石层
比较轻柔的摇滚乐；软岩石

sentences.en: Marye, my doctors, and a minute bit of common sense will keep me off the rock climbing walls.
sentences.cn: 我的医生，以及一丁点儿的常识将使我远离攀爬岩石或高墙。

sentences.en: As with sky diving or rock climbing, speaking before an audience becomes easier the more often you do it.
sentences.cn: 如果反复练习，与跳伞或攀岩运动相比，在听众面前演说就会变得越来越容易。

sentences.en: Up until my class began, I was under the impression that I would do a lot of climbing as part of my rock climbing class. I did make it up a small wall during the class, so there was some climbing.
sentences.cn: 直到我的课开始我才知道，因为在我的印象里，我将会作很多攀岩练习作为登山攀岩课程的一部分--------我在教室里的一座小墙上做一些上下攀爬练习，但是，课程主要是专注于攀岩设备和安全措施，练习绳结。

sentences.en: a stone wall
sentences.cn: 石墙

sentences.en: stone steps
sentences.cn: 石台阶

sentences.en: The floors are made of stone.
sentences.cn: 地面是石头铺成的。

phrases.cn: 天然石；天然石材；天然宝石

sentences.en: The house had a fairly large garden.
sentences.cn: 那幢房子有个不小的花园。

sentences.en: She speaks English fairly well.
sentences.cn: 她英语讲得还不错。

sentences.en: The instructions seem fairly straightforward.
sentences.cn: 操作指南似乎很简明。

trans.tranCn: 无困难的；顺利的；光滑的；平坦的

sentences.en: Her skin felt smooth and cool.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤摸上去又滑又凉。

sentences.en: a smooth pebble
sentences.cn: 光滑的卵石

sentences.en: The stone steps had been worn smooth .
sentences.cn: 石阶被磨得光溜溜的了。

phrases.cn: 光滑表面；光滑面；平滑面
正常运转；平稳运转，稳定运转

sentences.en: a long, straight road
sentences.cn: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.en: Try to keep your legs straight.
sentences.cn: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.en: Always lift with a straight back.
sentences.cn: 提东西的时候，一定要把背挺直。

phrases.cn: 直率地；真实地；（酒）不加冰块的

sentences.en: We looked for a flat spot where we could pitch our tent (= put up our tent ) .
sentences.cn: 我们寻找一个平缓的地方搭帐篷。

phrases.cn: 大帐篷政策（包容各种不同的政治和社会观点）
帐篷城（搭有很多帐篷的社群的别称）

sentences.en: I’ll stay with her until she falls asleep .
sentences.cn: 我会一直陪着她，直到她睡着。

sentences.en: I think that I’ve fallen in love with Angela.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我爱上安杰拉了。

sentences.en: She fell ill with flu.
sentences.cn: 她患感冒，病倒了。

phrases.cn: 到期；集合；排队；倒塌；与某人在一起

sentences.en: I can not fall asleep after drinking coffee this late.
sentences.cn: 现在这么晚了，喝咖啡之后我不能入睡。

sentences.en: And only then as I finally fall asleep do I register the blood I saw on the sock when I wiped my leg, the blood from my piss. I sleep.
sentences.cn: 我想到了家，这个很管用，我开始昏昏欲睡，我终于注意到我擦大腿的那只袜子上的血迹，尿出来的血，却马上睡着了。

sentences.en: I said his heaven would be only half alive; and he said mine would be drunk: I said I should fall asleep in his; and he said he could not breathe in mine, and began to grow very snappish.
sentences.cn: 我说他的天堂是半死不活的；他说我的天堂是发酒疯；我说我在他的天堂里一定要睡着的；他说他在我的天堂里就要喘不过气来，于是他开始变得非常暴躁。

sentences.en: If he is found guilty, he will almost certainly hang.
sentences.cn: 如果被判有罪，他几乎肯定会被处以绞刑。

phrases.cn: 坚持下去；不挂断；握住不放

sentences.en: a sudden change in the weather
sentences.cn: 天气的突然变化

sentences.en: Life is cruel, she thought, with a sudden rush of anger.
sentences.cn: 生活真残酷，她想，心头突然涌上一股怒气。

sentences.en: a sudden movement
sentences.cn: 突然的一动

phrases.cn: n. 猝死；突然死亡；[体]突然死亡法（决赛中的一分或一球定胜负法）

sentences.en: I’ve never fired a gun in my life.
sentences.cn: 我这辈子从来没开过枪。

sentences.en: Jake was pointing a gun at the door.
sentences.cn: 杰克用枪对着门口。

sentences.en: Two policemen were killed in a gun battle .
sentences.cn: 两名警察在一次枪战中丧生。

sentences.en: a baby’s soft skin
sentences.cn: 婴儿细嫩的皮肤

sentences.en: The fur was soft to the touch.
sentences.cn: 这皮毛摸起来很柔滑。

phrases.cn: 比较轻柔的摇滚乐；软岩石

sentences.en: We stood still and watched as the deer came closer.
sentences.cn: 我们一动不动地站着，看那头鹿走近。

sentences.en: Keep still while I tie your shoe.
sentences.cn: 别动，我给你系鞋带。

sentences.en: the still waters of the lake
sentences.cn: 平静的湖面

sentences.en: a walk in the woods
sentences.cn: 林间的散步

sentences.en: Her body was found in a pool of blood.
sentences.cn: 她的尸体被发现倒在血泊之中。

sentences.en: Blood oozed from a cut on his forehead.
sentences.cn: 血从他额头的伤口里渗了出来。

sentences.en: Blood tests proved he was not the father.
sentences.cn: 验血证明他不是孩子的父亲。

phrases.cn: [废语](动物)充满活力的，生气勃勃的

sentences.en: I stopped and waited for her to catch up.
sentences.cn: 我停下来等她赶上。

sentences.en: Please read the agreement and sign it.
sentences.cn: 请阅读协议书并签字。

sentences.en: a school for blind children
sentences.cn: 盲童学校

sentences.en: the needs of blind people
sentences.cn: 盲人的需要

sentences.en: He was slowly going blind (=  becoming blind  ) .
sentences.cn: 他眼睛在渐渐失明。

phrases.cn: n. 从未见面的男女经第三者安排所作的约会

trans.tranCn: 哎哟（用于表示突然的疼痛）

sentences.en: Ouch! That hurt!
sentences.cn: 哎唷！ 好疼！

sentences.en: He has called off the trip.
sentences.cn: 他取消了这次旅行。

sentences.en: The government has promised wide-ranging health care for all.
sentences.cn: 政府许诺提供广泛的全民医疗保健服务。

sentences.en: health care workers
sentences.cn: 医疗保健工作人员

sentences.en: He will be hard to beat. I fully expect (= am completely sure about ) that and I’m ready.
sentences.cn: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

sentences.en: ‘Who are you?’ he murmured, only half expecting (= thinking it was possible, but not likely ) her to answer.
sentences.cn: “你是谁？”他低声问道，预计她可能不会回答。

sentences.en: He didn’t get his expected pay rise.
sentences.cn: 他没有得到他预想的加薪。

sentences.en: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.en: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.cn: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.en: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.cn: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.en: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.cn: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.en: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.cn: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.en: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.cn: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.en: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.cn: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.en: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克办这次聚会花了不少精力。

sentences.en: Learning to speak another language takes effort.
sentences.cn: 学说外语要下功夫。

sentences.en: So every once in a while, turn off your phone and laptop, switch off the TV and lay your worries temporarily to the side.
sentences.cn: 因此不妨偶尔关掉你的电话，电脑和电视，把烦恼暂时放在一边，和自己（或是你的同伴）约个会， 至少完整的

sentences.en: chemicals that harm the environment
sentences.cn: 损害环境的化学品

phrases.cn: 加害某人;让某人不满意[亦作do someone harm]

sentences.en: They were always dropping by, usually without invitation.
sentences.cn: 他们常常来串门，通常不请自来。

sentences.en: There was a calendar on the wall above, with large squares around the dates.
sentences.cn: 墙的上方曾有一本日历，日期框在大方格里。

sentences.en: Can you help me blow up these balloons?
sentences.cn: 你帮我把这些气球吹起来好吗？

sentences.en: He burst the balloon in my face.
sentences.cn: 他对着我的脸弄爆了气球。

sentences.en: A white cross was painted on the door.
sentences.cn: 门上画着白十字架。

sentences.en: Turner is famous for painting landscapes.
sentences.cn: 特纳以风景画闻名。

sentences.en: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.cn: 把牛奶煮开。

sentences.en: Freda heated up a pie for me but I couldn't eat it.
sentences.cn: 弗雷达为我热了一块馅饼，可我不能吃。

sentences.en: a knife and fork
sentences.cn: 一副刀叉

sentences.en: Some young people are carrying knives to defend themselves.
sentences.cn: 一些年轻人带着刀子防身。

sentences.en: a kitchen knife
sentences.cn: 厨房用刀

sentences.en: Put the knives and forks on the table.
sentences.cn: 把刀叉摆放在桌子上。

sentences.en: I'd like a cheeseburger to take away, please.
sentences.cn: 劳驾，我想买走一个干酪汉堡包。

sentences.en: Her beauty is of the Italian type.
sentences.cn: 她的美是意大利型的。

sentences.en: It's the first time a Westerner has been convicted for a drug-related offence in recent years in China.
sentences.cn: 这是近年来第一次有西方人在中国被判犯有与毒品有关的罪行。

sentences.en: the industrial countries of the West
sentences.cn: 西方工业国

trans.tranCn: 端上（食物和饮料）；服侍⋯⋯进餐

sentences.en: The waiter was serving another table.
sentences.cn: 那名侍应生在接待另一桌客人。

sentences.en: Sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.
sentences.cn: 撒上干酪立刻上桌。

sentences.en: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.cn: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.en: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.cn: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.en: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.cn: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

phrases.cn: 相似图形；相似形（similar figure的复数）

sentences.en: The bird flapped its wings furiously.
sentences.cn: 那只鸟使劲地拍打着翅膀。

sentences.cn: 斯宾塞夫人

phrases.cn: n. 小姐；女士；未婚妻；女朋友

sentences.en: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
sentences.cn: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.en: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.cn: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.en: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
sentences.cn: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

在自己身上用手画十字(表示祈求上帝保佑)

sentences.en: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.en: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.cn: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.en: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.cn: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

sentences.en: The price is £25.50, including postage and packing.
sentences.cn: 价钱是25.5英镑，含邮费和包装费。

sentences.en: You’ll need a variety of skills, including leadership and negotiating.
sentences.cn: 你将需要各种技巧，包括领导能力和协商能力。

sentences.en: Pay attention to the body language of the speaker.
sentences.cn: 注意说话者的肢体语言。

phrases.cn: 说母语的人，说本族语的人
特邀发言人，客席讲者；嘉宾演讲人

sentences.en: I’ll have to ask my boss for a day off.
sentences.cn: 我得向老板请一天假。

sentences.en: Since I’m my own boss (=  I work for myself, rather than for an employer  ) , my hours are flexible.
sentences.cn: 我自己当老板，所以我的时间很灵活。

sentences.en: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.cn: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

phrases.cn: n. （美）国务卿；（英）国务大臣；（美）州政府秘书长

sentences.en: It’s about a page and a quarter.
sentences.cn: 大概是一又四分之一页。

sentences.en: Cut the cake into quarters.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕切成四等份。

phrases.cn: 第一个季度；上弦月；上弦

sentences.en: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.cn: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.en: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.cn: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.en: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
sentences.cn: 设x大于或等于零。

sentences.en: Do you fancy going out for an Indian?
sentences.cn: 你想出去吃印度菜吗？

sentences.en: Jo’s not really the sporty type.
sentences.cn: 乔可不是那种喜欢运动的人。

sentences.en: A man twitched the handbag from her hand.
sentences.cn: 一个人从她手中抢走了手提包。

sentences.en: The policeman turned the contents of her handbag out onto the table.
sentences.cn: 警察把她手提包里的东西全倒在了桌上。

sentences.en: I always have one in my handbag and it has never failed me.
sentences.cn: 我经常在我的手提包里放上一个，并且它从来都没有让我失望。

sentences.en: a song with a beat you can dance to
sentences.cn: 带有舞蹈节奏的一首歌曲

phrases.cn: [口]意想不到；压倒一切；了不起
在某件事上占某人之先

trans.tranCn: [口] 对不起，请原谅（用于礼貌地请求别人重复自己没听清或不理解的话）

sentences.en: ‘Hurry up Jonathan!’ ‘Pardon?’ ‘I said hurry up!’
sentences.cn: “快点，乔纳森！”“你说什么啊？”“我说快点！”

phrases.cn: 原谅(或宽恕)某人(做)某事(如犯错误等) [亦作 pardon someone something]

sentences.en: Maybe he intends to leave her.
sentences.cn: 也许他打算离开她。

sentences.en: What do you intend doing when you get to this place?
sentences.cn: 你打算到这里干什么？

phrases.cn: 希望有或接到；打算成为……

sentences.en: Quick! Go and fetch a doctor.
sentences.cn: 快！去请医生来。

sentences.en: Shannon went upstairs to fetch some blankets.
sentences.cn: 香农上楼去拿些毯子。

sentences.en: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.cn: 最经典的例子是摊薄饼的时候，颠勺时薄饼就会飞到半空中。

sentences.en: The package says baking and pancake mix, but the pancakes were not tasty without some major tweaking to the recipe.
sentences.cn: 包装盒上说烤焙与薄饼面料混合，但没有添加一些主要调料，薄饼是不好吃的。

sentences.en: a dozen red roses
sentences.cn: 一打红玫瑰

sentences.en: A large bouquet of roses arrived on her desk.
sentences.cn: 一大束玫瑰送到了她的桌子上。

phrases.cn: n. 红玫瑰；[史]英国兰开斯特家族族徽

sentences.en: I can’t thank you enough for your kindness.
sentences.cn: 你的好意我感激不尽。

sentences.en: The Coast Guard had given up all hope of finding the two divers alive.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队已放弃了两名潜水员生还的全部希望。

sentences.en: However, it is found in the study of mountain tourist hotel , the important matter in hotel design is try one's best to saving fund in build hotel and obtain maximal economy advantage.
sentences.cn: 然而在对以往建成山地旅游宾馆的研究中发现，尽量的节约建设宾馆的投入资金，并促使宾馆在经营中获得最大的经济利益成为了宾馆设计所重视的问题。

sentences.en: Dad seemed more disappointed than angry.
sentences.cn: 与其说爸爸生气，倒不如说他失望。

sentences.en: disappointed customers
sentences.cn: 失望的顾客

sentences.en: She put a cup of tea down on the bedside table.
sentences.cn: 她把一杯茶放在了床边的桌子上。

sentences.en: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.cn: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.en: This is just a quick note to let you know that I won’t be in the office tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我写这封短笺是想告诉你们我明天不在办公室。

sentences.en: a suicide note
sentences.cn: 自杀遗书

trans.tranCn: ⋯⋯的人，那个人，那些人（用于提供关于正在谈论的某人的信息或补充信息）
